alert.note: Alert for Casey; Garrard; Lincoln (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 4:38PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Lincoln, south central Garrard and east central Casey Counties through 515 PM EDT... At 438 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles east of Liberty, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Lincoln, south central Garrard and east central Casey Counties, including the following locations... South Fork, Crab Orchard, Halls Gap, Kings Mountain, New Salem, Ottenheim, Turkeytown, Broughtentown, Walltown and Middleburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 800 PM EDT for central Kentucky.
